price: Jedhi: "Inni Isa dachii keessa isin facaaseedha; garuma Isaatti oofamtus."
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
